getStartedPage.metaDescription: Join Engyx and start investing in the future of digital energy. Connect your wallet and create your account in a few simple steps.
getStartedPage.title: Join the Energy Revolution
getStartedPage.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to create your account and start investing in tokenized energy assets.
getStartedPage.step1Desc: The first step to access the world of digital assets.
getStartedPage.step2Desc: Secure your profile and manage your investments.
getStartedPage.step3Desc: You are all set! Explore your dashboard.
getStartedPage.allSetDesc: Your account is ready. Welcome to the future of energy.
getStartedPage.securityDesc1: Non-custodial wallet connection ensures you're always in control of your funds.
getStartedPage.securityDesc3: Audited smart contracts and transparent operations.

wallets.connectDescription: Choose your preferred network to continue.
wallets.evmDescription: Connect with MetaMask, Trust Wallet, etc.

homePage.heroSubtitle: Tokenized renewable energy infrastructure for a sustainable and accessible investment.
homePage.featuresSubtitle: Our platform combines the power of blockchain with sustainable energy to offer unique investment opportunities.
homePage.mainFeatureDesc: We transform physical sustainable assets into digital tokens, democratizing investment and providing liquidity.
homePage.feature1Desc: Advanced blockchain technology ensures the security and transparency of your investments.
homePage.feature2Desc: Invest in projects that directly contribute to a greener, more sustainable future.
homePage.feature3Desc: Lower entry barriers to high-value assets, making clean energy accessible to all.
homePage.feature4Desc: Digital tokens provide unprecedented liquidity for traditional illiquid assets.
homePage.howItWorksSubtitle: Investing in sustainable energy has never been easier. Follow our simple steps.
homePage.step1Desc: Browse a wide range of renewable energy projects on our platform.
homePage.step2Desc: Purchase tokens representing real assets using blockchain technology.
homePage.step3Desc: Receive passive income from energy generation and carbon credits.
homePage.step4Desc: Monitor the environmental and financial performance of your investments in real-time.
homePage.servicesSubtitle: We offer comprehensive solutions for investors and project developers.
homePage.service1Desc: Facilitate the digital representation of energy projects on the blockchain.
homePage.service2Desc: Provide a transparent and efficient marketplace for verified carbon credits.
homePage.service3Desc: Tools to track and optimize your investments in renewable energy.
homePage.service4Desc: Expert guidance for your journey in sustainable digital assets.
homePage.ctaSubtitle: Join Engyx and be part of the sustainable energy revolution. Start investing today.
homePage.metaDescription: Engyx: Tokenized renewable energy infrastructure for sustainable and accessible investment.
homePage.tokenizedAssetsSubtitle: Transforms physical sustainable assets into digital tokens to create new investment and financing opportunities.
homePage.renewableEnergiesDesc: Tokenizes solar, wind, and hydroelectric projects to democratize investment in clean energy.
homePage.carbonCreditsDesc: Trades verified carbon credits on the blockchain for a transparent and efficient market.
homePage.sustainableInfrastructureDesc: Invests in green infrastructure like smart buildings and clean transportation systems.
